empymod¶

Version: 1.0.dev; Date: Dec 03, 2016

Manual for empymod, a one-dimensional, electromagnetic forward modeller in Python.

The electromagnetic python modeller empymod can model electric or magnetic responses due to a three-dimensional electric or magnetic source in a layered-earth model with electric vertical isotropy (\(\rho_h, \lambda\)), electric permittivity (\(\epsilon_h, \epsilon_v\)), and magnetic permeability (\(\mu_h, \mu_v\)), from very low frequencies (\(f \to 0\) Hz) to very high frequencies (\(f \to\) GHz).
